item.title: Computer Graphics From Scratch
item.author: me.sahilgautam.github.io (Sahil Gautam)
item.description: I wanted to work in C++, as I web-dev doesn’t interest me. So I asked on #C++-general IRC channel about how can I get started, and I got recommended Computer Graphics from Scratch - Gabriel Gambetta.

item.title: User Hostile Dialog Box
item.author: me.sahilgautam.github.io (Sahil Gautam)
item.description: What do I want to achieve It’s important to set some target before jumping into and starting to do the thing. I would like to make an annoying “Donate Now” dialog The dialog would show up whenever the user starts libreoffice, or whenever he switches to different modules like calc or writer etc. The dialog would look something like the mockup shown below. The dialog should have a faint background image which shows all the community members, to give out cheerfull vibes.
